<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PerfJITEventListener::OpenMarker() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We mmap the jitdump to create an MMAP RECORD in perf.data file.  The mmap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is captured either live (perf record running when we mmap) or in deferred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mode, via /proc/PID/maps. The MMAP record is used as a marker of a jitdump</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mapping must be PROT&#95;EXEC to ensure it is captured by perf record</span></CodeLine>
